options.title: -d, --date=STRING
options.description: display time described by STRING, not 'now'

options.title: -d, --date=STRING
options.description: display time described by STRING, not 'now'

options.title: --debug
options.description: annotate the parsed date, and warn about questionable usage to stderr

options.title: -f, --file=DATEFILE
options.description: like --date; once for each line of DATEFILE

options.title: -f, --file=DATEFILE
options.description: like --date; once for each line of DATEFILE

options.title: -I[FMT], --iso-8601[=FMT]
options.description:
output date/time in ISO 8601 format. FMT='date' for date only (the
      default), 'hours', 'minutes', 'seconds', or 'ns' for date and time to the
      indicated precision. Example: 2006-08-14T02:34:56-06:00

options.title: -I[FMT], --iso-8601[=FMT]
options.description:
output date/time in ISO 8601 format. FMT='date' for date only (the
      default), 'hours', 'minutes', 'seconds', or 'ns' for date and time to the
      indicated precision. Example: 2006-08-14T02:34:56-06:00

options.title: -R, --rfc-email
options.description:
output date and time in RFC 5322 format. Example: Mon, 14 Aug 2006
      02:34:56 -0600

options.title: -R, --rfc-email
options.description:
output date and time in RFC 5322 format. Example: Mon, 14 Aug 2006
      02:34:56 -0600

options.title: --rfc-3339=FMT
options.description:
output date/time in RFC 3339 format. FMT='date', 'seconds', or 'ns' for
      date and time to the indicated precision. Example: 2006-08-14
      02:34:56-06:00

options.title: -r, --reference=FILE
options.description: display the last modification time of FILE

options.title: -r, --reference=FILE
options.description: display the last modification time of FILE

options.title: -u, --utc, --universal
options.description: print or set Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

options.title: -u, --utc, --universal
options.description: print or set Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)

options.title: -u, --utc, --universal
options.description: print or set Coordinated Universal Time (UTC)
